name: getSoapy
author: getSoapy

sections.description:
getSoapy offers a variety of services for window cleaners, including tools to help with quotes, payment and lead generation.
This plugging lets you easily embed all these services into your WordPress website.

Note: You’ll need a getSoapy account, signup for free at getsoapy.com
sections.installation:
When you install the getSoapy plugin we’ll try to automatically detect your business ID based on your website address. If this doesn’t work, you’ll need to go to the setting page and enter it. You can find your business ID in the inline help on app.getsoapy.com.

Once installed, the floating quote widget will show on any page which doesn’t include the quote widget. You can disable this using the plugin settings page.

To place the quote or payment widget anywhere on your website just select them from the blocks menu.

If your theme or wordpress version doesn’t support blocks, you can use the following shortcodes:

[getsoapy_quote]

[getsoapy_pay]

[getsoapy_portal]
sections.changelog:
1.6.0

Add support for upcoming Document feature.

1.5.2

Minor updates and bug fixes.

1.5.1

Readme updates.

1.5

Update to new branding and add support for the contact portal.

1.4.1

Fix activation hook.

1.4

We’re thrilled no announce support for blocks ðŸŽ‰

Now it’s even easier to embed the quote or payment widget on your wordpress website.
Just look for the ‘getSoapy’ category when inserting a new block, then pick the quote or pay widget.

1.3.0

There’s a number of updates in this releases:

  • We’ve added controls for the new floating quote button – customers can now request a quote from any page on your website!
  • When you install the plugin or view the plugin settings we’ll now try to automatically detect your business ID using your website domain.
  • We’ve added more settings and now allow you to override any of the JavaScript plugins advanced settings.

1.2.1

Automatically flush rewrite rules to ensure the domain verification route works.

1.2.0

Added support to completely disabling loading of stylesheets.
Moved settings into their own page under plugins

1.1.0

Added options to override the default widget styles and hidden certain fields.

1.0.1

Minor Changes

1.0.0

Initial release
